text: DXEX-DTV, Channel 20, is a commercial television station of Philippine television network A2Z. It is owned by ZOE Broadcasting Network and operated under blocktime agreement by ABS-CBN Corporation. Its transmitter and master control are located at Davao City. ==Upcoming programs== * Balitang A2Z Davao Region * Ulat A2Z Davao Region ==Digital television== ===Digital channels=== UHF Channel 20 (509.143 MHz) Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Notes 20.01 480i 4:3 A2Z A2Z Commercial test broadcast (5.5 kW) 20.02 480i 4:3 Light TV Light TV 20.22 240p 4:3 A2Z OneSeg A2Z 1seg broadcast == Areas of coverage == === Primary areas === * Davao City * Davao del Sur * Davao del Norte ==== Secondary areas ==== * Portion of Davao de Oro * Portion of Davao Oriental ==Related pages== * ZOE Broadcasting Network * Light TV * A2Z ==References== Category:2022 establishments in the Philippines Category:Filipino television stations
title: DXEX-DTV
